questions.text: what are rabbits most terrified of?
what is the bully of the feeder's name?
how did Blue get revenge on the robin who scolded him?
questions.answer: He plucked one of the robin's eggs, broke it open and ate it

questions.text: what is the oldest rabbit brother's name?
what is the rabbit narrator's name?
what is the human given name of the rabbit who was named and kept by humans, and what did she change her name to?
name one of the three things Grandmother Sage taught her kits?
questions.answer: Stories matter, rabbits have dignity, or stay alive

questions.text: why did Goosegrass bring out Grandmother's special comb?
questions.answer: To separate the tails of two squirrels whose tails were stuck together

questions.text: who stole the dragonfly comb?
who are Piper, Windy and Beaker?
what prevented Thistle from completing her road test?
why did Mother Firstfledge come to the rabbit warren during lessons?
questions.answer: She requested Butternut come out to see Piper fledge

questions.text: where did Piper land when he fledged?
the hoof of what creature came through the rabbit's lecture hall?
who stood up to Blue?
what is the name of the fawn with the broken leg?
name one of the three foods Winsome said were her favorites?
what creature was feeding out of the garbage bins when Piper and Butternut went to look for food in them?
what does Winsome's mother call rabbits?
what did Winsome find in the woodsâ€”something she promised to give to Piper in the future?
which two creatures raced each other?
questions.answer: Piper the robin and Winsome the deer

questions.text: who first discovered that Butternut had been sneaking out at night?
what did Butternut pray would take her the day of her road test?
what held Blue at bay that day?
what kind of creature said to Butternut, "Don't worry. I'm bringing you back to your family."?
what creature died during Butternut's road test?
who left peanuts for Blue?
what terrible thing did Winsome find?
what is the rescue plan Butternut came up with?
questions.answer: Take the pups one at a time to the human's back door

questions.text: who leaves the night of the coyote pup rescue?
who did Butternut ask for help from after Winsome and her mother left?
how many rabbits did it take to move one coyote pup?
in a surprising twist, who fended off an owl?
who did Butternut decide to befriend at the end of the tale?
is grooming very important, and there is a very special comb with a dragonfly on it?
does someone say, "our milkweed is our brain power"?
does someone use their righteous indignation to do something daring?
does a bird poop on someone's face?
does someone say, "And characters are like bananas; if they're good, you can never have too many"?
do creatures rummage through garbage bins looking for food?
does someone offer to eat the bugs off of another's back?
does someone have a "tiny treasure box of goodness"?
does someone crash into a window?
does someone suggest a nice trivia duel on weed species?
